title: Maanja Lyrics Maan Karate Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Maanja
Singer:  Anirudh
Music: Anirudh
Movie: Maan Karate
Lyrics: Kaarky

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Maanja pottu thaan
nenjaa koottula pattam vittu ponaa.
Maanga mandayil poongaa senjuthaan
kadhal nattu ponaa.

Kuchi ice-la echchi vachava
pichi enna thinnaa..
holi kannula feeling kaattithan
gaali gaali pannaa.

Hey pickaaliyaa...
roatu mela paada vittu
thakkaaliyaa...
enna urutti vittaa.

Hey naaskka thunnuttu
neattaa thoonguven
ada naan goyaala ippa
kadhal vandhu aaduren.

Maanja pottu thaan
nenjaa koottula pattam vittu ponaa.
Maanga mandayil poongaa senjuthaan
kadhal nattu ponaa.

Oh maama come to me baby
wont u come right now.
we can fly out in the sun.
We can burn it up n
heat it up n take it down
gonna be crazy n super fun. (2)

One pitch catchula kadhal pitchula
gaaju aadi ninnen.
Laa ball onnula middle stumpule
yendi bold panna.

Yaakkar yethina yaarke sexya
sixer thookki vitta
lottaa kaiyila nenja kalichithaan
comedy aakki puttaa

gummaangoliya naan inga ninnen
kondhittu poraa naan enna panna

Oru kaidha naanga peteru
nee mainna kondhu pasteru
avalothaan namma maateru

ada naan goyaala ippa
kadhal vandhu aaduren.

Maanja pottu thaan
nenjaa koottula pattam vittu ponaa.
Maanga mandayil poongaa senjuthaan
kadhal nattu ponaa.

Oh maama come to me baby
wont u come right now.
we can fly out in the sun.
We can burn it up n
heat it up n take it down
gonna be crazy n super fun.		English Translation
I tried my best :)
She flew kite
in my heart.
She build a park in my head
and planted love in it.

She who had ice cream
ate me by making pieces.
With her beautiful eyes
she knocked me out.

Like a moron
am singing in road sides.
Like a tomato
she scrolled me on mud.

I will sleep clean
after eating - but
oh man, now i'm dancing
because of this love..

She flew kite
in my heart.
She build a park in my head
and planted love in it.

Oh maama come to me baby
wont u come right now.
we can fly out in the sun.
We can burn it up n
heat it up n take it down
gonna be crazy n super fun. (2)

I was standing well
by playing dot ball in this love game.
but in last ball
you bowled me in middle stump.

I bowled yorker but
you scored a sexy sixer.
You ripped my heart
and made it funny.

I stood like anything
she plucked and went away.

I’m a useless fellow named peter
you are gum stuck to me
thats all our matter here.

oh man, now i'm dancing
because of this love..

She flew kite
in my heart.
She build a park in my head
and planted love in it.

Oh maama come to me baby
wont u come right now.
we can fly out in the sun.
We can burn it up n
heat it up n take it down
gonna be crazy n super fun.
